column8:
The workshop is a remarkable opportunity to learn more about the working of a generator, why it should be overhauled over time and the technical know how, all by real time hands on experience.

It involves disassembly of an old generator, understanding the various parts and the trouble shoot , imparting necessary repairs, and turning it into a good-as-new one.

When should generator be overhauled?

Diesel powered generators can run from a range of 12,000 - 20,000 hours before they require engine overhauls.

 How?
Involves various processes like Disassembly, Inspection, Cleaning, Repair, Reassembly and Testing.

column3: Advanced Lathe and Machine Tools Workshop
column8:
A great opportunity for exploring the advanced lathe and machine tools.

Lathe operations

Facing
Turning
Slotting
Cutting
Drilling
Chamfering
Tapering
Threading
Knurling

Working of Lathe

A lathe uses rotational force and a stationary cutting tool to shape a workpiece. Removing material from a workpiece is the lathe's primary function.
column9: Hands on Experience in Machining a Working Piece using Lathe Machine
